description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 8, 2024 at14:00EDT. All bids submitted after14:00EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSo) for Temporary Help Services

#### Solicitation Summary

* Solicitation Reference Number: WS4542756144
* Solicitation Title: Temporary Help Services RISO (Regina, Saskatoon, Alberta, and Prince Albert)
* Solicitation Status: Expiré (Expired)

#### Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSo) for Temporary Help Services to provide support to federal government departments and agencies in Regina, Saskatoon, Alberta, and Prince Albert as and when required.

This procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business. It is intended to issue multiple Standing Offers to qualified contractors.

**Bid Submission Requirements**

Bidders are required to submit their bid in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation document. All bids must comply with the specified requirements, and any non-conforming bids may be declared non-responsive.

**Key Dates**

* Solicitation Publication Date: April 23, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 8, 2024, 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing

#### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, QC
	+ K1A 0S5
	+ Canada
* Contact Person: Melanie Perrin (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Procurement Details

* UNSPSC Code: 80110000 (Human resources services) and 80111600 (Temporary personnel services)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Regions of Opportunity: None specified
* Regions of Delivery: Regina, Saskatoon, Alberta, and Prince Albert

You can review the complete solicitation document on the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19444895?extsite=MTk0NDQ4OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg
